title: fold in test cases from Lucene in Action 2nd edition
description:
Manning Publications Co., publisher of Lucene in Action, 2nd edition
(http://manning.com/lucene) wishes to donate all of the book's source
code, to fold into Lucene's tests!

It'll take some iterating to get the tests folded in... I'll attach
the initial patch.

comments.content: Initial raw patch, just puts the sources under src/liatests, as a placeholder.  We need to move these under the src/test/* tree...
comments.author: Michael McCandless

comments.content: The surround test cases have already been done in LUCENE-1563
comments.author: Paul Elschot

comments.content: Forgot to include the books data (used to create the test index used by many tests).
comments.author: Michael McCandless
